info.title: Coleridge Rich Context Publications Ingestion
info.description:
Proposal:

- The scorecard and the metadata pre scorecard will have different data sources (different tables or databases).
- The metadata providers will have their own metadata. We don't care if they send duplicated data. Each provider has its own data.
- It will allow them to add, update and delete their data as much as they want using the API proposed here.
- We will have a process that will compile all the metadata, remove duplicates, and create the scorecard data.
- Providers can have multiple tokens. The tokens used by the API will define who is the owner of the data.

post.description:
Create publications endpoint. Multiple publications can be created at the same time.

- If the payload becomes too big, a 413 HTTP error will be returned.
- If the server receives the request successfully, it will return a JSON of the status of each publication.
